title: Questions about ocean week 2017
body: I was wondering a few things about the ocean week? Do we have to be in the oceanic server in order to get the points or can we be in the NA server? Also can we not enlist for the ip boost unless we are in the oceanic server? Thank you to whoever answers this for me !

replies.body:
Hey there,

>Do we have to be in the oceanic server in order to get the points or can we be in the NA server?

Yes, you must be on the Oceanic server to enroll for ocean week and thus earn points.

>Also can we not enlist for the ip boost unless we are in the oceanic server?

As above.
